name: moss-covered relic
description: A strange artifact. It looks like a beautiful veined rock banded with precious metals and with an etched diamond bottom, covered in red moss. You can't seem to be able to remove the moss no matter how hard you try and it is warm to the touch.

name: spider mastermind brain
description: Ripped and torn from his spider exoskeleton, this HUGE brain is quite the trophy.

name: triffid heart
description: The wooden heart of the triffids, now completely still. Eerily enough, it's unpleasantly warm.

name: ant queen egg
description: An unbearably hot fleshy sac the queen deposited moments before her death. You can barely see a large form inside it, like a stillborn ant queen.

name: brain blob nodule
description: Oily and sticky at the same time, this sick nodule is possibly the grossest thing you've ever touched. It radiates a strange warmth and seems to glow from the inside.

name: zombified megabear skull
description: The colossal skull of a megabear that has succumbed to the infection. "So fell Lord Perth, and the countryside did shake with that thunder."

name: jabberwock skull
description: The 'skull' of a jabberwock. Its many oddly shaped empty sockets seem to stare at you, thrumming with malice.
